solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean canConstruct(String ransomNote, String magazine) {--newline--        int[] arr = new int[26];--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < magazine.length(); i++) {--newline--            arr[magazine.charAt(i) - 'a']++;--newline--        }--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < ransomNote.length(); i++) {--newline--            if(--arr[ransomNote.charAt(i)-'a'] < 0) {--newline--                return false;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return true;--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
